title.oldValue: Microsoft Teams: Privacy options for frontline managers to control Time off in Shifts app
title.newValue: Microsoft Teams: Additional manager-controlled privacy settings in Shifts

description.oldValue:
Frontline Managers
will be able to set the level of visibility on Time off reason and notes for
frontline workers. These settings can be applied at the team level.
description.newValue: We are releasing additional manager-controlled privacy settings in the Shifts app. Frontline managers will be able to set the level of visibility on Time off reason and notes for frontline workers and they can set how far in the past their employees can view data in schedule view, to manage employees' views of each other's breaks and notes.
